title: classPlanMetadata
description: Schema for storing metadata about a Class Plan in Yogis

planId.description: Unique identifier for this class plan

planName.description: Human-readable title of the class plan

level.description: Level of difficulty for the class plan

numberOfElements.description: Total count of items (poses + flows) in this plan

duration.description: Estimated total duration of the class plan in minutes

elements.description: Ordered list of poses and flows in this class plan
